name: Blossoming Onion Lotus
description: This eye-catching dish is sure to impress your guests! A whole onion is cut and battered to resemble a beautiful lotus flower, and then deep-fried with potato slices to crispy perfection.

name: Fried Mac ‘n’ Cheese Sticks
description: America’s favorite comfort food gets an upgrade in this mac ‘n’ cheese variation that you can easily make by just adding a few steps to your usual pasta prep.

name: Pizza Bombs
description: These pizza bombs are a fun and easy twist on the classic pie! Soft and pillowy dough is filled with savory pizza toppings, then baked until golden and melty, creating a meal that's the perfect party pleaser.

name: Curly Fries
description: These curly fries are a crispy and addictive snack! The spiral shape and seasoning make for a fun and delicious side dish.
